comments:
Using I20040219 on NT /SP6

On the first start of a I20040219 build on an existing 3.0 stream workspace I
get the stack trace listed below. The main toolbar shows up nearly empty. If I
reset the perspective then the toolbar is correctly displayed but on restart of
the image the toolbar is once again nearly empty (just the first 3 icons upto
the printer on the Java perspective are shown).

!SESSION ----------------------------------------------------------------------
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.launcher 4 0 Feb 20, 2004 10:55:02.450
